step.cmd: Click where you want to insert a file on the page
Click the “Insert” tab and select the “File” icon
The “Files” icon will access your documents and related files on your computer
Once you select the file, it will prompt you to choose whether to Upload to Onedrive or insert attachment
Choose “Insert Attachment” and the file will be placed onto the page where you set your cursor
Selecting the inserted file on the page will open the original document
If you move the notebook the inserted file will move along with notebook
